column.name: DWH_SOURCE_IND
column.comment: Indicator from which system the data record comes (2: Debit, 3: Credit).

column.name: MARKET_CODE
column.comment: Market to which the customer is assigned. Examples are MMC (credit customers who have a contract with VfD2), PUC (credit customers who have a contract with a partner company), MMO (prepaid customers who are directly assigned to VfD2), PUA (prepdaid customers who have a partner company) ), XMK ​​(Cross Market).

column.name: CONTRACT_TYPE
column.comment: The contract type associated with the SOC, refers to CONTRACT_TYPE table.

column.name: SYS_CREATION_DATE
column.comment: Date of creation of the data record in the operative system

column.name: SYS_UPDATE_DATE
column.comment: Date of modification of the data record in the operative system

column.name: OPERATOR_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the last user

column.name: APPLICATION_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the application that last processed the sentence

column.name: INITIAL_PERIOD
column.comment: Number of days in this period.

column.name: ADDITIONAL_PERIOD
column.comment: This attribute indicates the initial period (in months) the customer must be committed to its Tariff Option.  In case the customer did not annouce an intention to cancel his subscription within the alloted time,  the tariff option commitment is automatically renewed for the amount of time specified in this field.

column.name: INIT_CNL_NOTICE_UNIT
column.comment: Initial Cancellation Notice Unit - this attribute denotes the notification period unit for the initial period. This is the minimum amount of time (whether in months, days, weeks, years) before the initial period (described above) is over that the subscriber has to notify of tariff option termination.  For example, if the specified amount of time is 2 (in weeks) then the customer has to announce his intention to withdraw from the tariff option at least two weeks in advance.  If no such notice is given within the alloted time, the tariff option subscription is automatically renewed.

column.name: INIT_CNL_NOTICE_PRD
column.comment: Initial Cancellation Notice Period - This attribute denotes the notification period for the initial period. This is the unit of the time period described  by the field INITIAL_CANCEL_NOTICE_UNIT.  That is, if the above field is 2 and this field is  "weeks" then the cancellation period is two weeks. Valid Values: M - Month D - Days W - Weeks Y - Years

column.name: INIT_CNL_NOTICE_TRMN
column.comment: Initial Cancellation Notice Termination - This attribute denotes the termination period of the initial cancellation period. Valid Values: M - End of the Month Q - End of the Quarter A - Specific Date

column.name: ADD_CNL_NOTICE_UNIT
column.comment: Initial Cancellation Notice Unit - this attribute denotes the notification period unit for the initial period. This is the minimum amount of time (whether in months, days, weeks, years) before the initial period (described above) is over that the subscriber has to notify of tariff option termination.  For example, if the specified amount of time is 2 (in weeks) then the customer has to announce his intention to withdraw from the tariff option at least two weeks in advance.  If no such notice is given within the alloted time, the tariff option subscription is automatically renewed.

column.name: ADD_CNL_NOTICE_PRD
column.comment: Additional Cancellation Notice Period - This attribute denotes the notification period for the additional period. This is the unit of the time period described by the field ADDITIONAL_CANCEL_NOTICE_UNIT. It applies to the automatically renewed tariff option contract. Valid Values: · M - Month · D - Days · W - Weeks · Y - Years

column.name: ADD_CNL_NOTICE_TRMN
column.comment: Additional Cancellation Notice Termination - This attribute denotes the termination period of the additional cancellation period.   Valid Values: · M - End of the Month · Q - End of the Quarter · A - Specific Date

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.comment: description

column.name: CONTRACT_LEVEL
column.comment: The entity for which the contract is defined: S - Soc, T - Tariff option

column.name: PROLONGING_PERMITTED
column.comment: Indicates whether the contract is prolonging permitted.

column.name: GRACE_ADD_PRD
column.comment: Unit of mesurment for the of  monthes the user is allowed to add the ZuhauseFlatrate24 after the activation date - "D" - days, "W" - weeks, "M" - months, "Y" - years

column.name: GRACE_ADD_UNIT
column.comment: Number of units the user is allowed to add the ZuhauseFlatrate24 after the prolongation date

column.name: GRACE_REMOVE_PRD
column.comment: Unit of mesurment for the of days the user is allowed to remove the ZuhauseFlatrate24 after the prolongation date - "D" - days, "W" - weeks, "M" - months, "Y" - years

column.name: GRACE_REMOVE_UNIT
column.comment: Number of units  the user is allowed to remove the ZuhauseFlatrate24 after the prolongation date
